[size="4"][color="Orange"]About[/color][/size]

[b]Masque[/b] is an add-on that provides a skinning engine for button-based add-ons through a library-based API.

[size="4"][color="Orange"]Features[/color][/size]

[b]Library[/b]
[list]
[*] Easy-to-use API accessible through [url="https://www.curseforge.com/wow/addons/libstub"]LibStub[/url]
[*] Group-based skinning engine
[*] Independent saved-variables
[*] Support for most button types and regions
[*] Support for third-party skins
[/list]
[b]GUI[/b]
[list]
[*] Load-on-demand settings panel
[*] Global, per-add-on and per-group settings
[*] Skin, Color, Gloss and Shadow options
[*] Full profile support, including per-spec profiles (Retail only)
[/list]

[size="4"][color="Orange"]Requirements[/color][/size]

[list]
[*] An action bar, aura or inventory add-on that supports Masque.
[*] All required libraries are included.
[/list]

[size="4"][color="Orange"]Installation[/color][/size]

Install the package through your preferred add-on manager or extract the archive to your add-ons directory.

[list]
[*] [b]Retail:[/b] [font="Courier New"][color="Orange"]World of Warcraft\_retail_\Interface\AddOns[/color][/font]
[*] [b]Classic:[/b] [font="Courier New"][color="Orange"]World of Warcraft\_classic_era_\Interface\AddOns[/color][/font]
[*] [b]Wrath Classic:[/b] [font="Courier New"][color="Orange"]World of Warcraft\_classic_\Interface\AddOns[/color][/font]
[/list]

[size="4"][color="Orange"]Options[/color][/size]

To access Masque's options, use the [font="Courier New"][color="Orange"]/msq[/color][/font] or [font="Courier New"][color="Orange"]/masque[/color][/font] chat commands. You can also access the options via the [b]Interface Options Window[/b] or by clicking on Masque's icon in a [b]DataBroker[/b] display.

[size="4"][color="Orange"]Credits[/color][/size]

[url="https://www.curseforge.com/members/_ForgeUser463"]JJ Sheets[/url] for the original project.

[size="4"][color="Orange"]Feedback[/color][/size]

For bug reports and suggestions, use the [url="https://github.com/SFX-WoW/Masque/issues"]issue tracker[/url]. Direct any questions or comments to [url="https://discord.gg/7MTWRgDzz8"]Discord[/url].

[size="4"][color="Orange"]Localization[/color]
[/size]
To help translate this add-on, use the [url="https://www.curseforge.com/wow/addons/masque/localization"]localization system[/url]. Alternatively, you can use the [url="https://github.com/SFX-WoW/Masque/issues"]issue tracker[/url].

[size="4"][color="Orange"]Links[/color][/size]

[b]Resources[/b]
[list]
[*] [url="https://github.com/SFX-WoW/Masque/wiki"]Documentation[/url]
[*] [url="https://github.com/SFX-WoW/Masque/wiki/Skin-List"]Skin List[/url]
[/list]
[b]Mirrors[/b]
[list]
[*] [url="https://github.com/SFX-WoW/Masque"]GitHub[/url]
[*] [url="https://www.curseforge.com/wow/addons/masque"]CurseForge[/url]
[*] [url="https://addons.wago.io/addons/masque"]Wago.io[/url]
[/list]
UIChangeLog:
[size="5"]11.2.10[/size]

[size="4"]API[/size]

[list]
[*]The [font="monospace"]UpdateSpellAlert[/font] API method now accepts a second parameter, [font="monospace"]Region[/font], as the frame containing the animatiions.
[list]
[*]This should make it easier for add-ons to ensure that [b]Masque[/b] gets the region properly.
[/list]

[*]Updated the [font="monospace"]API_VERSION[/font] to [font="monospace"]110210[/font].
[/list]

[size="4"]Localization[/size]

[list]
[*]Updated [font="monospace"]ptBR[/font]. (Denshi_KRS)(#464)
[/list]

[size="4"]Bug Fixes[/size]

[list]
[*]Fixed an issue that prevented a button-level mask from having its clamp mode set correctly. (#463)
[/list]

[url="https://github.com/SFX-WoW/Masque/wiki/History"]Release History[/url]
